channel.title: Removing links from gallery/summary in squarespace
channel.description:
Hi there,
I saw this post /talk/t/remove-any-image-click-link-lightbox-from-gallery-page/7513
But I'm still stuck and was wondering if you would be able to help me?
I want to remove the links on two pages which have summary galleries on them, one is here http://www.insigniamedical.co.uk/our-team/ and one isnt live yet.
However I don't want this to effect any other blocks on other pages.
Any advice very much appreciated
Clare

item.title: Removing links from gallery/summary in squarespace
item.dc:creator: @Clare_Carpenter Clare
item.description:
@Clare_Carpenter wrote:

Hi Cregox,

Thanks for coming back to me, not to worry though, found someone who could help out.

Thanks though,

Clare

Read full topic

item.title: Removing links from gallery/summary in squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Maybe next week I'll have time to take a look.

As for affecting other pages, either inject code on the page configuration or as a Code Block.

Read full topic
